author: Home Repair Tutor
description: Tile shower wall tips…I used a large diamond hole saw and template to make this easy. Adding water to the saw reduces chipping. This method is great for shower valves or toilet flanges. If you’re tiling a shower and need help, definitely check out our Video Library at homerepairtutor.com 👍🏽🔥#tileshower #homeremodeling #bathroomgoals
title: Tile Shower Wall Tips - #shorts #homerepairtutor #tileshower
